question: About which of the following books, Mahatma Gandhi has said that “it brought about an instaneous and practical transformation in my life”?
option3: Kingdom of God is within You
explanation: Unto This Last is an essay and book on economy which was written by John Ruskin. It was first published in 1860 in the monthly journal Cornhill Magazine. Ruskin inspired Gandhiji's decision to live an austere life. Gandhiji quoted "It brought about an instaneous and practical transformation in my life".
